description: This crêpe will be loved by fans of cheese.
name: Crêpe with Rocket, Cheddar, Parmesan, Truffle Mayo & Onions Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the milk, 2 eggs, salt and combine fully. Incrementally add the flour to the mix so that the mixture doesn't become too heavy and stays a little runny.
Heat up a pan to a medium heat with a little butter and pour 1/8 of the mixture onto the pan (you should get 8 pancakes from this batter).

Tilt the pan around so that the batter fills the pan fully and fry for 2 minutes. After 2 minutes, flip the crepe over and fry for 2 more minutes and set to one side. Add your mayo, onion, cheese and salads to the crepe and fold or roll before serving.
